MovieCharadesGUI module

class MovieCharadesGUI.MovieCharadesGUI(lives=3, attempts=3)[source]

Bases: object

CS50P Movie Charades GUI

An interactive game where the user is presented with an AI-generated image from the DALL·E 2 API. The image is based on a randomly selected movie title from the top 1000 rated movies on MoviesMiniDatabase retrieved through RapidAPI. The user’s task is to guess the movie title associated with the image.

Author: Nedko Dimitrov Version: 2.0

Create and display the footer label with attribution to the APIs used.

Create and display the label for the AI-generated image.

Create and display the input entry and guess button in a frame.

create_labels()[source]

Create and display the score, lives, header, and masked movie title labels.

load_level()[source]

Load a new level with a new movie title and AI-generated image.

on_guess_button_click()[source]

Handler for the Guess button click event.

play_game()[source]

Start the game by loading the first level.

update_lives_label()[source]

Update the lives label when the player loses a life.

update_remaining_attempts_label(remaining_attempts)[source]

Update the label displaying the remaining attempts.

Parameters:

remaining_attempts (int) – The remaining attempts for the current movie title.

update_score_label()[source]

Update the score label when the player guesses correctly.
